verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] slated to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un Monday night at 9 p.m. for a historic summit in Singapore .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] is [V: slated] [ARG2: to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un Monday night at 9 p.m. for a historic summit in Singapore] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is slated to [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: Monday night] [ARGM-TMP: at 9 p.m.] [ARGM-PRP: for a historic summit in Singapore] .
